Deeper Christian Life Ministry nke a makwara dị ka Deeper Life Bible Church bụ òtù ndị Pentikọstal nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa, Deeper Life Biblia Church Lagos, na Gbagada, Lagos. Ọ bụ General Superintendent nke Deeper Life Bible Church, Pastor William Folorunso Kumuyi na-elekọta ya.
N'afọ 1973, mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nkuzi mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Lagos, W.F
Kumuyi malitere otu ọmụmụ Bible na ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum 15 bịara ya na-arịọ maka ọzụzụ n'Akwụkwọ Nsọ.   Chọọchị ahụ malitere dị ka Deep Christian Life Ministry
Kumuyi bụ onye bụbu onye Anglịkan nke sonyeere Chọọchị Okwukwe Ndịozi mgbe e mechara ya baptizim. N'afọ 1975, a chụpụrụ ya na chọọchị maka ikwusa ozi ọma na-enweghị asambodo
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ozi onwe ya, nke na afọ 1982 ghọrọ Deeper Life Bible Church

Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1980, obere ìgwè ahụ etoola ruo ọtụtụ puku, n'oge ahụ ka e guzobere Deeper Life Bible Church. Ụlọuka ahụ agbasaala n'ebe ndịda Sahara Afrika wee gaa United Kingdom, ebe e si mepụta alaka na ọdịda anyanwụ Europe, Russia, India, na North America.
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, Ngalaba Ndụ Ndị Kraịst Deeper nwere isi ụlọ ụka ọhụrụ ya na Gbagada nke e nyere ya na osote onye isi ala Naịjirịa Yemi Osinbajo n'etiti ndị ọzọ a ma ama
Okpukpe ahụ nwere nkwupụta okwukwe Pentikọstal. Chọọchị ahụ nwere nkwenkwe isi iri abụọ na abụọ.
